    Podcasts

    Updated 03 Jan 2023

    Design & Development

    • Creative Pep Talk
      Andy J Miller is an extremely encouraging host.
    • Shop Talk
      Chris Coyier and Dave Rupert host a show on front-end web development.
    • Australian Design Radio
      Try Episode 02, 32, 33
    • Ask A Freelancer
      A short-format podcast where Andy [J Miller] answers three submitted questions.

    Comedy

    • Spontaneanation
      Improv show hosted by Paul F Tompkins. Try Episodes 137, 156, 159
    • Comedy Bang! Bang!
      Scott Aukerman interviews comedians and other strange characters.
    • Threedom
      Paul F Tompkins, Lauren Lapkus, and Scott Aukerman hang out.
    • Stay F Homekins
      Paul F Tompkins and Janie Haddad Tompkins stay home during a global pandemic
    • The Big Ones
      Amanda Lund and Maria Blasucci – the best co-hosting duo in podcasts – tackle the big questions of life.
    • Superego
      Improvised sketches by Drs Matt Gourley, Jeremy Carter, and Paul F Tompkins.

    Stories

    • Reply All
      Stories about the internet, hosted by PJ Vogt and Alex Goldman. “It features stories about how people shape the internet, and the internet shapes people.” Try Episode 56.
    • Imaginary Worlds
    • Mystery Show
    • Heavyweight

    Canada

    • Front Burner
      A deep dive on a current news story from the CBC.
    • CBC News: World Report
      Daily 10-min news show from the CBC.
    • Canadaland
    • Commons
      The political side of *Canadaland*.
    • The Imposter
      Canadian art show from *Canadaland*.

    Information

    • Function
    • Today Explained
    • Invisibilia

    Media

    • Song Exploder
      Musicians take apart their songs, and piece by piece, tell the story of how they were made.
    • Cinema of Meaning by Thomas Flight and Tom van der Linden
    • Oeuvre Busters by Liam Billingham and George Fragopoulos
    • The Insert Credit Show
      Several games industry professionals, including Tim Rogers, talk about video games. Loose enough to be fun, structured enough to keep momentum.
    • Young Adult Movie Ministry by Alissa Wilkinson and Sam Thielman
    • James Bonding
      Matt Mira and Matt Gourley revisit every James Bond film with their comedy friends.
    • Good Christian Fun
      Kevin and Caroline poke fun at Christian pop culture.
    • Dissect
      Dissect is a serialized music podcast. Season 1 looks at Kendrick Lamar’s To Pimp a Butterfly.

    Etc

    • Panic Podcast
      The sidequests, subplots, and accidents of history that round out the software development and game publisher, Panic. The stories behind Untitled Goose Game, Pantscast, and more.
    • Code Switch
      “A team of journalists fascinated by the overlapping themes of race, ethnicity and culture, how they play out in our lives and communities, and how all of this is shifting.”
    • The Sporkful
      The Sporkful isn’t for foodies, it’s for eaters.
    • Switched On Pop
      A songwriter and a musicologist break down how popular music works.
    • Sunday Night in Canada
    • Whatevertown
      Okay, this one is mine.
    • Whatevertales
